body_content.explanation: on the internet, the act of creating a false identity (= a name and character) in order to express praise, support, or criticism of a particular organization or person without showing who you really are:
examples: Sometimes editors resort to sock puppetry, creating lots of accounts and pretending to be several different people in a debate so as to create the illusion of support for a particular position.
It would be useful if sockpuppetry could be minimized by tracking IP addresses.
